sentences.sContent: We gonna mosh through the marsh, take us right through the doors.
sentences.sContent_eng: We gonna mosh through the marsh, take us right through the doors.
sentences.sCn: 我们要在这沼泽中前进， 使我们的权利通过这些门。

sentences.sContent: Long strips of glazing set vertically into white frames face out into the marsh landscape of the site.
sentences.sContent_eng: Long strips of glazing set vertically into white frames face out into the marsh landscape of the site.
sentences.sCn: 曲线形的立面朝向基地的湿地，其垂直的白色框架间镶嵌着长条的玻璃窗。

synos.tran: [地理]沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

remMethod.val: mars(火星) ＋ h → 火星上可能会有沼泽 → 沼泽

trans.tranOther: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft
